item.title: new year new blog
item.description: as the name suggest i hope this will be the beginning of an exciting journey of sharing experiences and things about software and all things in between. first time doing something like this so hope this can eventually be of use to as many people as possible. thank you again for making the time scroll through and check this out :)!

item.title: about
item.description: hi, i’m hristo! i’m a dev based in London and currenty working for Thoughtworks. previously worked for a London-based fintech start-up where it all started for me. i really enjoy not just building software but reading about all kinds of things ranging from crime novels and biographies to psychology and science and i hope this space would be great for sharing all my thoughts and impressions.
